participant_1.background:
I am pretty poor financially.
I have a few pet iguanas.
I like to give them sassy sounding names that actually help people think nice things.
I think dogs could learn to read if they were trained well.
I have a brother but we don t talk much yet.

participant_2.background:
My favorite show is scooby doo.
I like dr pepper and black jack gum , but not together.
In the evenings i watch the door at a club where they play punkrock.
I draw comic books.

content.text: Hi, I'm participant_1.
Hi, nice to meet you! I'm participant_2.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to watch Scooby Doo, draw comic books, and play video games.
Oh, cool! I love Scooby Doo too! What's your favorite episode?
I love the one where they go to the haunted mansion.
That's a good one! I also love the one where they go to the wax museum.
Those are both great! What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to draw comic books, too. I also like to read, write, and play video games.
Oh, cool! I like to read and write too. What's your favorite book?
My favorite book is The Lord of the Rings.
Oh, I love that book! I've read it so many times.
Me too! I love the story and the characters.
Me too! What's your favorite character?
I think my favorite character is Aragorn. He's such a strong and brave character.
I agree! He's a great character. What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to play video games. I'm a big fan of the Zelda series.
Oh, cool! I love the Zelda series too. What's your favorite game in the series?
My favorite game is Ocarina of Time. I love the story and the characters.
Oh, I love that game too! It's such a classic.
Me too! It's one of my favorite games of all time.
